name: Open-Faced Ham and Cheese Sandwich
author: Coffee4MySoul
summary: This delicious open-faced sandwich - topped with a fried egg - will knock your socks off! If desired, drizzle with sriracha sauce for a little extra flavor and a little kick.
directions: Spread pesto over one side of the bread
Cover the cheese completely with ham
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat
Add sandwich ham-side down; cook until ham starts to caramelize and cheese begins to melt, 3 to 4 minutes
Spread 1 tablespoon butter carefully over the top side of the bread
Flip and cook sandwich until buttered side is golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes
Meanwhile, melt butter in another skillet
Crack egg into the hot butter and fry until white is set, 3 to 5 minutes
Transfer sandwich to a plate and top with the fried egg
